price: ߊ߲ ߞߵߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߡߌ߬ߘߊ߬ ߦߟߍߓߐߝߋ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߥߟߊ߫ ߢߊ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߓߘߊ߫ ߝߏ߬ߘߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ( ߒ߬ ߢߊߝߍ߬ )؟
arabic: أَتَّخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا أَمۡ زَاغَتۡ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: attakhadhnāhum sikh'riyyan am zāghat ʿanhumu al-abṣāru
